text:
Created attachment 23905
Fix Javadoc and Junit

Javadoc needs the classpath otherwise it generates lots of errors.

Junit needs the formatter otherwise test errors are very difficult to track down
creator: sebb@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 24038
Add formatter to JUnit tests; exclude duplicate CheckOutThreadTest

New version of patch to fix all junit tests.

Also excludes CheckOutThreadTest from last test otherwise it runs twice
creator: sebb@apache.org
